				}

					color: #333333;

	<div class="tribe-events-schedule tribe-clearfix">

	<!-- Event header -->

			<!-- Event featured image, but exclude link -->
			
			<!-- Event content -->
						<div class="tribe-events-single-event-description tribe-events-content">
				<p>WICS will be hosting a tour of <a href="http://moves.com/" target="_blank">House of Moves</a>!</p>
<p>We will be having lunch with the animators from House of Moves. They will be covering motion capture and animation in the tour and even allow us to try on a motion capture suit if anyone would like.</p>
<p>If you are <strong>sure</strong> that you will be going to the House of Moves tour, please <strong>fill out this <span style="color: #ff0000;"><a style="color: #ff0000;" href="http://goo.gl/forms/HSd68P3dJO" target="_blank">Google Form</a></span></strong>. The deadline to sign up for the tour is <span style="text-decoration: underline;">FRIDAY, Nov. 7th @ 11:59pm</span>. There are a limited amount of spots so sign up ASAP! Drivers will get first choice, the tour is located in LA.</p>
